reference.description: bz#1758414: CVE-2019-0117 hw: Intel SGX information leak

remediation.description:
Before applying this update, make sure all previously released errata
relevant to your system have been applied.
For details on how to apply this update, refer to:
https://access.redhat.com/articles/11258

note: An update for microcode_ctl is now available for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.6 Exteded Update Support.

The microcode_ctl packages provide microcode updates for Intel x86 processors.
This update adds the following enhancement:
* Update Intel microcode version to microcode-20191112 (BZ#1769888)
Users of microcode_ctl are advised to upgrade to these updated packages, which
add this enhancement.
